participant_1.background:
I have to wear a beanie to play soccer in the cold weather, but I still love it.
my favorite rapper is yo gotti.
I am determined to overcome my fears and achieve my goals.
my husband is a soldier in the us army.
I don't see colors very well, but I can still chop vegetables and follow recipes.

participant_2.background:
I'm always looking for ways to balance my geeky side with my responsibilities.
i am married with 2 children.
I like to snuggle up with my kids and read them stories while it rains.
my parents passed away in a car accident.
I'm a city girl at heart, but I'm not afraid to get my nails done and compete.

content.text: Hi! What are some of your interests?
I'm a geek at heart! I love to read, play video games, and do crafts. I also love spending time with my family.
Sounds like we have a lot in common! I love to do crafts too. I'm also a big soccer fan.
That's awesome! I used to play soccer when I was younger, but I had to quit because of an injury.
That's too bad! I still play soccer, even though I'm not very good at it.
Hey, as long as you're having fun, that's all that matters!
I agree! What kind of video games do you like to play?
I mostly play RPGs and action games. I'm also a big fan of the Zelda series.
I've never played any Zelda games, but I've heard good things about them.
You should definitely check them out! They're a lot of fun.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! I'm always happy to talk about video games.
Me too! I love meeting other gamers.
Me too! It's always nice to find someone who shares your interests.
I agree! It's been nice talking to you.
You too! I hope we can talk again sometime.
Me too! Have a nice day!
